mapper.select: SELECT name as name, lines as lines, score as score, shape_count as shapeCount, tick_count as tickCount, ts as ts FROM top ORDER BY score DESC, lines DESC, shape_count DESC, tick_count DESC, ts ASC LIMIT 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO top (name, lines, score, shape_count, tick_count, ts) VALUES (#{name}, #{lines}, #{score}, #{shapeCount}, #{tickCount}, #{ts})
